main event: An observer reported seeing a lighted object resembling a 'flying saucer' in Kokomo, Indiana, on 8 April 1950.
interesting points: The object was approximately fifty feet in diameter and made of grayish metal., It had three small portholes that emitted a blue-white light., The object rotated slowly on its perpendicular axis before ascending., It hovered for several minutes before moving away to the north at speeds three times that of an aircraft., The sighting was initially reported by an employee at the Continental Steel Corporation.
sighted object: a grayish metal disc with portholes
witness description: Mr. [redacted], a fabricator with the Continental Steel Corporation
